nodes.text: The Sivulliq Is Out There -- Somewhere

The Sivulliq Is Out There -- Somewhere is a short story in the Living Force campaign for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by Morrie Mullins and was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 4, 2001. The story was in the form of a press release by SoroSuub Corporation. It provided an in-universe account for the events that occurred at the Gen Con Game Fair 2001 Living Force interactive, Blown Away, wherein a contest winner was awarded the Sivulliq.
The story was hosted on the Wizards of the Coast website, but has since been taken down. It can still be found through the Wayback Machine.

Miim Te'Suub, the Director of Formal Activities for SoroSuub Corporation, announces the donation of a prototype starship, the Sivulliq, to an anonymous hero that helped defend Edic Bar from threats posed by pirates hiding in the clouds of Genarius.
